entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening and ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level near valley bottom. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
